channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Sea shares dip by over 8% as profit comes in below analyst expectations
item.description: Sea’s operating expenses rose 28% in the past quarter, with its e-commerce arm—Shopee—looking to strengthen its competitive edge over rivals.

item.title: Exclusive: Coinbase and stablecoin startup BVNK call off $2 billion acquisition
item.description: BVNK was previously fielding offers from not only Coinbase but Mastercard.
